name: Design System / v0.3
description:
Third public push of this file. More coming soon!


Contains the following items:

3 Grid Styles (Mobile, Table, and Desktop)

16 Color Styles

30 Type Styles

Icon Component Structure

3 Button Styles with Text Width and Full Width Options

4 Media Components (Image, Gallery, Video, Avatar)

1 Callout component consisting of (icon, heading, paragraph text, and two buttons)

1 Step Indicator component consisting of buttons and dividers.

Form inputs coming soon
